suite.name: TestDemo4

kw.name: Open the browser with the Mortgage payment URL
Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening url 'https://www.rahulshettyacademy.com/loginpagePractise/'

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'dashed' into text field 'id:username'.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id:password'.
Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'id:signInBtn'.

kw.name: wait until it checks and display error message
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css:.alert-danger' contains exact text 'Incorrect username/password.'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
